reviews.title: Fun to browse, but limited
reviews.comment: Like the name implies, it\'s a list of operas by title.  Each entry has a brief background, synopsis, and lists some recordings (unrated). The search function is limited to titles; you can\'t search by composer, character name or other term. It\'s fun to browse through in spare moments and discover some less-well-known works and look at the portraits of the composers, but it\'s not a substantial reference work.
